alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 7:37AM EST until December 28 at 10:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saddle River near Lodi. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 6.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 AM EST Thursday was 6.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 6.3 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.2 feet on 09/22/1938. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Saddle River Lodi 5.5 6.2 Thu 7 am EST 4.1 3.6 MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 745 PM EST.
